text: Sarawak is a state in Malaysia. It is mostly on the northwestern part of the island of Borneo. The capital city of Sarawak is Kuching. ==Languages== The official languages of Sarawak are Malay and English. Other local spoken languages include Chinese, Iban, Melanau, Bidayuh, Punan, Penan, Kelabit, Kayan and others. ==Religion== The largest religion in Sarawak is Christianity representing 50.1% of the total population according to the 2020 census. Islam is the second largest religion in Sarawak, followed by Buddhism. There are also minority religions like Hinduism, Baháʼí Faith and animism. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Borneo Category:Former British colonies Category:British Malaya
title: Sarawak
